pages.title: Training Treat
pages.text: This is the first treat you use to level up your cat.

pages.title: Super Treat
pages.text: Once you've leveled your cat up to the maximum from the basic Training Treat, this is the treat you use.

pages.title: Master Treat
pages.text: The last tier of training for your cat.

pages.title: Wild Treat
pages.text: This is a bonus leveling treat. Use this once you've leveled your cat all the way up.

pages.title: Breeding Treat
pages.text: This is the treat you use to enable your cats to make more cats!

pages.title: Treat Bag
pages.text: A place to keep your treats, so they don't take up all your inventory space.
